title: AudioIngestionMessage
description: Schema for messages published to Redis Streams audio.ingestion.

external_event_id.description: Stable identifier of the conversation payload.

package_uri.description: Full MinIO URI pointing to the tar.gz archive.

checksum.description: SHA-256 checksum of the archive, prefixed with sha256:.

schema_version.description: Semantic version of the payload schema (major.minor).

retry_count.description: Number of delivery attempts performed by the producer.

produced_at.description: UTC timestamp when the message was emitted.

producer.description: Information about the emitting service instance.

metadata.description: Optional additional fields agreed between teams.
